text: Colobothea pura is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1865. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Colobothea pura. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1865 Category:Beetles of South America
title: Colobothea pura
